title.rendered: The Forest 0.52b – Download for PC Free

content.rendered:
You’ve just survived a plane crash and crashed on a supposedly deserted island that hides many secrets. No, it’s not the plot of Lost but the story of this survival horror video game called The Forest, and this has nothing to do with the film of the same name. Here you are not dealing with parallel worlds, alternative realities or time travel, but with much more tangible dangers: a group of cannibals who want you to make their dinner.

So what is the goal of the forest?

This terror game has a single and very clear goal: to survive. And for this purpose you must use all the resources available in the open world game that you have in this sense will remind you of Minecraft, because you have to build everything you need to protect yourself against cannibal attacks: from shelters to traps, as well as weapons and hunting and harvesting tools. You can build almost anything to achieve your goal of surviving the night terrors.

The most important features

  • Spend your day exploring the island and discovering its network of underground lakes and caves.

  • Find food to keep from starving and cut down trees to build shelter and start a fire.

  • Protect your new home against hungry cannibals with traps and defenses.

  • Take refuge in your bunker at night and survive the hordes of enemies.

  • Choose to face them in battle or use your intelligence and stealth to stay alive another night.

  • Play collaboratively in online multiplayer.

Which mode is better? The forest or the rust?

As you read about the plot and objective of this video game for PC and PS4, you’re probably wondering if this game is for you, or if you’re better off looking for a title similar to Rust, another extreme survival game, should download. Both titles are perfectly complementary, you shouldn’t have to choose between one or the other, although we have to admit that if you’re not too keen on scares, you should opt for the video game from the creators of Garry’s Mod, the doesn’t contain the same horrible component found in The Forest is available.
